definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The system, made by Linde, splits hydrogen fluoride into fluorine.
sentences.chinese: 這個系統，由林德集團製造，能將氟化氫分解成氟氣。

sentences.english: And you have the bond energy in HF.
sentences.chinese: 你得到氟化氫的共價能。

sentences.english: Hydrogen fluoride is the maternal product of fluorine chemical industry with a wide uses.
sentences.chinese: 氟化氫是氟化工的母體產品，用途廣泛。

sentences.english: And so this is the H-F bond in HF.
sentences.chinese: 所以這是氟化氫中的氫氟共價鍵。
